attributes.long-description:
Revisit the best that classic arcade gaming has to offer with the Arcade Apocalypse Bundle: a double feature of space shooter Titan Attacks and Roboton style arena shooter, Ultratron.

Combine your hatred of killer robots AND space aliens with the Arcade Apocalypse Bundle, a hi-octane double feature of Titan Attacks and Ultratron.

Ultratron is a twin-stick arena shooter inspired by some of the best that classic arcade gaming has to offer, updated and improved for the 21st century. Titan Attacks! builds on the same easy-to-learn but hard-to-master gameplay of classic arcade shooters, but is packed full of new features and strategies.

Both games are arcade titles on steroids, combining traditional risk-reward gameplay with upgrade systems, special weapon abilities, clever boss fights unique power-ups and online leaderboards. Ultratron also features a drop-in multiplayer co-op mod on the PS3™ and PS4™ systems.

This Cross-Buy product entitles you to download the PS3™ system, PS4™ system and 'PS Vita' system versions.
